articles.title: Bizarre new study proposes living inside asteroids - Daily Mail

articles.title: Io volcano world comes into view of Juno probe - BBC
articles.description: A Nasa spacecraft will be making ever closer encounters with Jupiter's hellish, lava-strewn moon.
articles.content:
Nasa's Juno probe is bearing down on Io, the most volcanically active world in the Solar System.
It's in the process of making a series of ever closer flybys.
